changeSet.author: CloudSoft.User3
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE registru_intrari_atasamente ( id BIGINT NOT NULL, registru_intrari_id BIGINT NOT NULL, file_name TEXT NOT NULL, file_content BYTEA NOT NULL,
CONSTRAINT registru_intrari_atasamente_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT registru_intrari_atasamente_registru_intrari_id_fk FOREIGN KEY (registru_intrari_id) REFERENCES registru_intrari(id) );

changeSet.author: CloudSoft.User3
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE registru_iesiri_atasamente ( id BIGINT NOT NULL, registru_iesiri_id BIGINT NOT NULL, file_name TEXT NOT NULL, file_content BYTEA NOT NULL,
CONSTRAINT registru_iesiri_atasamente_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT registru_iesiri_atasamente_registru_iesiri_id_fk FOREIGN KEY (registru_iesiri_id) REFERENCES registru_iesiri(id) );
